summary: This bill addresses the actions of a "Misbehaving Content Scraper." It instructs the scraper to respect robots.txt rules and acknowledges that its IP address has been rate limited. The bill suggests using the Government Publishing Office (GPO) Bulk Data Download service (https://www.gpo.gov/fdsys/bulkdata/) as an alternative for data acquisition. The main topic of this short bill is about data scraping ethics and respecting website terms of service and limitations. It doesn't appear to authorize any specific actions.
